meanings.sent1: The fuddled student couldn't remember where he left his books.
meanings.sent2: She felt fuddled after trying to solve the complex puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The fuddled squirrel kept running in circles around the tree.
meanings.sent4: His fuddled mind was like a tangled ball of yarn, impossible to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The fog was so thick it made everything look fuddled and blurry.

meanings.sent1: The fuddled man stumbled out of the bar, struggling to walk straight.
meanings.sent2: She regretted getting fuddled at the party last night.
meanings.sent3: The fuddled cat tried to chase its own tail, missing every time.
meanings.sent4: His fuddled state of mind was like being lost in a dense forest without a map.
meanings.sent5: The room spun around her, making her feel fuddled and disoriented.
